The `r-causal` organization is run by [Malcolm Barrett](https://malco.io/), [Lucy D'Agostino McGowan](https://www.lucymcgowan.com/), and [Travis Gerke](https://travisgerke.com/), the authors of [Causal Inference in R](https://www.r-causal.org/).
